snippet: The French Open was lambasted as "one big circus" by Tomas Berdych on Thursday as soggy weather once again exasperated players seeking a foothold in the semi-finals of the rain-hit claycourt major....
lead_paragraph: The French Open was lambasted as "one big circus" by Tomas Berdych on Thursday as soggy weather once again exasperated players seeking a foothold in the semi-finals of the rain-hit claycourt major.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic and Serena Avoid Distractions of French Open 'Circus'
headline.main: Djokovic and Serena Avoid Distractions of French Open 'Circus'
